entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:59 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 03:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain and Fog
Temperature: 9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 9.2°C
Wind: SE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
